id: Super Mario Maker Edition 2DS Heads Up Target's Black Friday Video Game Deals
paragraph: If you buy something through this post, IGN may get a share of the sale. For more, read our Terms of Use.Target's United States Black Friday ad is live, giving us a glimpse into the deals we can expect from the big red retailer on Black Friday. Among them is a Super Mario Maker special edition 2DS, with Super Mario Maker for 3DS preinstalled.The limited-edition system is yellow with orange-red highlights and has an NES Mario sprite located under the D-pad. Target has it listed at $79.99.Target also has a PS4 Slim with Marvel's Spider-Man bundle listed at $199, Assassin's Creed Odyssey, Forza Horizon 4, and more for $35, as well as God of War for $25 and Overwatch for $15. You can see the full ad on Target's website, but here are the best video game and technology Black Friday deals at Target this year.Black Friday falls on November 23 this year, meaning it's just three weeks away. Black Friday deals like this one will be trickling out over the next few weeks, and we'll keep you updated on what to expect.Both Walmart and Amazon have early Black Friday deals in place, so if you're looking to save some money ahead of the crowds, you can start right now. Be sure to check out our round up of what to expect from the best Black Friday deals for 2018.Seth Macy is IGN's tech and commerce editor and seeker of deals. You can find him on Twitter @sethmacy.We encourage you to read our updated PRIVACY POLICY and COOKIE POLICY.
